elements.name: Copier Information Text
elements.text: Information and specifications on available copier models can be found here: Abadan Hanford Band Specifications

elements.name: Information Text
elements.text: NOTE: The Band 4, 5 and 6 copiers require a dedicated 20amp power source. Please contact your Building Admin or the Mission Service Desk if needed.
elements.visible: (values('Service Type')=="Install New Copier" || values('Service Type')=="Exchange Existing Copier" ||  values('Service Type')=="Move Copier") && values('New Copier Model')=="BAND 4" || values('New Copier Model')=="BAND 5" || values('New Copier Model')=="BAND 6"
